```{r }

# load data and subset

head(data)
```

```{r }
heatmapPurpleOrange <- RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(11, "PuOr")
```



```{r}
rownames(data) <- data$X
data.heatmap <- data[,-1]
head(data.heatmap)
```
```{r}
colnames(data.heatmap) <- c("control1", "control2", "estradiol1", "estradiol2")
head(data.heatmap)
```

```{r}
noz_data.heatmap <- data.heatmap[rowSums(ovtemp.heatmap[, -1] >0) !=0, ]
head(noz_data.heatmap)
```


```{r}
pheatmap(noz_data.heatmap, cluster_rows=T, show_rownames=T, cluster_columns=T, na.rm=TRUE, scale="row", main = "Gene Counts by Treatment", color=rev(c("dodgerblue3", "goldenrod1")), fontsize = 7)
```
